title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Technology Integration for International MBA Students in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics and business administration knowledge
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more effective strategies for utilizing technological tools in blended learning environments
Learners can quantitatively compare and analyze two advantages of blended learning over traditional learning through project-based assignments
Learners can achieve at least 80% goal attainment by applying a blended learning design framework considering cultural diversity to PBL projects
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
